sentences.en: Higher medical costs legislate against an improvement in health.
sentences.cn: 医疗费用的上涨妨碍了健康的改善.

sentences.en: Is it necessary to legislate to regulate pet - keeping?
sentences.cn: 你认为有必要通过立法来规范宠物饲养 吗 ?

sentences.en: It is necessary to legislate for large - value electronic funds transfer.
sentences.cn: 大额电子资金划拨立法势在必行.

sentences.en: It is the jobof Parliament to legislate.
It's impossible to legislate for every contingency.
sentences.cn: 为每一偶发事件都立法是不可能的.

sentences.en: Legislate to control the pour of waster water.
sentences.cn: 制定法规控制废水排放.

sentences.en: Malaysia likely to legislate biofuel use.
sentences.cn: 马来西亚拟立法推广生物柴油.

sentences.en: Most member countries have already legislated against excessive overtime.
sentences.cn: 大部分成员国已经立法禁止过度加班。

sentences.en: Parliament have legislate against the sale of drag or to prevent the sale of drug.
sentences.cn: 议会已立法,禁止毒品出售或阻止毒品的销售.

sentences.en: Parliament may legislate on any matter of penal law.
sentences.cn: 议会可以对刑事法律的任何事项立法.

sentences.en: People legislate continually by means of talk.
sentences.cn: 人们用讲话不断地制订着法律.

sentences.en: The Australian Parliament retains the full power to legislate over territories and can override their laws.
sentences.cn: 澳大利亚议会保留了完整的权力和对领土的立法可以覆盖他们的法律.

sentences.en: The CEO gave board a lot of motivation to legislate new laws.
sentences.cn: 执行总裁给予理事会许多制定新法律的动因.

sentences.en: Therefore, it is very urgent to legislate for the right of privacy.
sentences.cn: 因此, 为隐私权立法刻不容缓.

sentences.en: We can legislate about relative in - law, stipulate maintenance obligation and inheritance right between them.
sentences.cn: 建议针对直系姻亲关系立法, 规定晚辈直系姻亲的赡养义务,并就继承问题做相关配套规定.

sentences.en: You cannot legislate to change attitudes.
sentences.cn: 态度是不能用立法来改变的。

trans.tran_en: to make a law about something

trans.tran_cn: 立法，制定法律，〈美〉以立法程序创立
